item.title: Creative staff training
item.description:
Tailored learning for team development, putting your company first.

Tags: 
staff training employee training creative training training provider
Sections: 

Bounce Culture - Inner Rhythm

Inner Rhythm

Help your team fulfil its potential

We work with a wide variety of companies to provide creative staff training that develops team work, self-confidence, encourages creative thinking and helps improve communication skills. 

We do that and more in a way that truly engages all staff.

Our creative processes used to make a mix, write a song or produce a podcast will;

  • Boost self-confidence
  • Encourage team-work
  • Promote new ways of creative thinking and learning
  • Reinforce the value of roles, responsibilities, skill sets and personalities in successful teams

We are proud of our culturally diverse and enriching activities. With team members originating from France, Jamaica, Italy, Ghana, Ireland, Kenya and the U.K but all residing in Northern Ireland, we are in a unique position to offer an authentic cultural experience. We use tunes and technology to;

  • Encourage communication
  • Ignite discussion
  • Maintain team spirit

The mix you create, the tune you make or the podcast you take will provide sources of;

  • Motivation
  • Learning
  • Cohesion 

Content created also provides a voice for your team and company as well as bookmarking development for future sessions!! We are confident that connecting with our inner rhythm increases our productivity daily. We would love to do the same for you. Helping others fulfil their potential is the heartbeat of Bounce Culture. 

To find out more, call us on +4478 03343880 or email us at info@bounceculture.co.uk.
